str_c(features,  collapse = \" + \"))),\n    data = train_df\n  ) %>% \n\n  step_novel(all_nominal_predictors()) \n                   \nfolds <- vfold_cv(train_df, \n                  v = 6,\n                  repeats = 1,\n                  strata = depression)    \n                   \nctrl <- stacks::control_stack_grid()                                \n                                     \n```\n\n## Lightgbm\n\n```{r}\n#| label: lgbm\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\n#| fig.width: 12\n\nboost_tree_lgbm_spec <- \n  boost_tree(\n    trees = 1e2L,\n   tree_depth = tune(),\n   learn_rate =  tune(),\n   min_n = tune(),\n#   mtry = tune(),\n   loss_reduction = 0\n  ) %>% \n  set_engine(engine = \"lightgbm\",\n             is_unbalance = TRUE,\n             num_leaves = tune(),\n             num_threads = cores\n       #      boosting = \"goss\"   # this may slow the runtime\n             ) %>%\n  set_mode(mode = \"classification\") \n                   \nwf <- workflow(rec,\n               boost_tree_lgbm_spec) \n\nparam <- wf %>%\n   extract_parameter_set_dials() %>%\n   recipes::update(\n      min_n = min_n(range = c(10,90)),\n      tree_depth = tree_depth(range = c(4,40)),\n      learn_rate = learn_rate(range = c(-2,-1)),\n      num_leaves = num_leaves(range = c(700,1000))\n   ) %>%\n   dials::finalize(raw_df)                 \n\nlgbm_rs <- tune_grid(\n  wf,\n  grid = 25,\n  resamples = folds,\n  control = ctrl,\n  metrics = metric_set(mn_log_loss, accuracy),\n  param_info = param)\n\nshow_best(lgbm_rs, metric = \"mn_log_loss\")  \n\nautoplot(lgbm_rs)\n\ncollect_metrics(lgbm_rs) %>% \n  filter(.metric == \"mn_log_loss\") %>% \n  mutate(.config = fct_reorder(.config, mean)) %>% \n  ggplot(aes(mean, .config)) +\n  geom_point() +\n  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin = mean - std_err, xmax = mean + std_err)) +\n  labs(title = \"Mean Log Loss across resample folds with std_err\")\n                   \n\n```\n\n# Importance\n```{r }                   \n#| label: importance\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\n                   \nbest_accuracy <-   select_best(lgbm_rs, metric = \"accuracy\")                 \n                   \nfinal_lgbm <- wf %>%\n    finalize_workflow(best_accuracy) \n                  \nclassification_fit <- final_lgbm %>%\n                        fit(train_df) \n\nclassification_fit |> \n  extract_fit_engine() |> \n  lgb.importance() |> \n  as_tibble() %>% \n  ggplot(aes(x = Gain, y = fct_reorder(Feature, Gain))) +\n  geom_col() +\n  labs(title = \"Feature Importance\", x = \"Gain\", y = NULL, caption = \"LightGBM Model | Visual: Jim Gruman\")                    \n                    \n```\n                   \n# Submission\n                   \n```{r}\n#| label: submission\n#|
